name: 翁頌舜
objective: 資料探勘與知識發現課程的目的在學習應用資料探勘技術、知識發現技術與資料倉儲概念，從企業資料庫中，探勘出對提升企業競爭力有幫助的知識。課程內容包含下列主題: 1. 資料探勘與知識發現概論 2. 資料探勘技術於資料庫與資料倉儲的應用 3. 關聯法則探勘 4. 分類 5. 群集分析 6. 文件探勘 7. 資料探勘在企業的應用 8. 資料探勘的各種研究領域 9. 資料探勘軟體實作。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction: What is Data Mining?
Week 2: Approaches to Data Mining
Week 3: Data Mining Techniques: Association Rule Mining
Week 4: Data Mining Techniques: Association Rule Mining
Week 5: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 6: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 7: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 8: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 9: 期中實作與報告
Week 10: Data Mining Techniques: Cluster Analysis
Week 11: Data Mining Techniques: Cluster Analysis
Week 12: Text Mining and Mining Complex Data
Week 13: Applications and Trends in Data Mining
Week 14: Deep Learning and ChatGPT Techniques
Week 15: Deep Learning and ChatGPT Techniques
Week 16: 資料探勘軟體實作 (1)
Week 17: 資料探勘軟體實作 (2)
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 課堂出席與課堂參與 25%
2. 報告，作業與專案製作 30%
3. 期末考試  45%
materials:
1.“Introduction to Data Mining”, 2019, Second Edition, Pang-Ning Tan, Michael Steinbach, Anuj Karpatne, Vipin Kumar, Publisher: Pearson.
2.“Data Mining, Concepts and Techniques”, 2012, 3rd Edition, Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, Jian Pei, Publisher: Morgan Kaufmann.

name: 陳宏佳
objective:
知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1. 知識發現與資料探勘概論 2. 資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3. 資料處理技術 4. 教導型學習方法 5. 教導型學習方法 6. 關聯法則探勘 7. 資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.
